text: Horsfieldia macrothyrsa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Sumatra. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Horsfieldia macrothyrsa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
